item.title: PowerShell and WinSCP
item.dc:creator: GRPosh
item.description: Video recording for our September meeting. https://grposh.github.io/2017/powershell-and-winscp/

item.title: PSJobs: Scanning for EternalBlue Vulnerability at Scale
item.dc:creator: GRPosh
item.description: After the recent WannaCry/WannaCrypt malware out break, IT Pros all over the world where faced with the same task of verifying that all systems where properly patched and that SMB1 is shutdown. Join us for a presentation from Thomas Malkewitz (@dotps1) on how he used PowerShell Jobs and CIM to quickly scan thousands of systems to ensure they where properly patched and not at risk for this exploit.

item.title: PSWebServer
item.dc:creator: GRPosh
item.description:
This is our first attempt at recording our presentations, and I now realize, I need to focus more on the screen, rather then the speaker. Maybe next time...

You can find all of Micah Rairdon's (@tiberriver256) code snippets on our GRPosh GitHub Presentation Repo (https://github.com/GRPosh/Presentations). And the PSWebServer module can currently be found here: https://gist.github.com/Tiberriver256/868226421866ccebd2310f1073dd1a1e
